about_the_game:
This DLC gives you access to create a custom character in SpaceSlog via our reward system on our website.

You can choose from a set list for:

  • Full name
  • Hairstyle
  • Facial hair
  • Body type
  • Gender
  • Hair colour
  • Body colour
  • Profession

Your name is subject to approval according to our guidelines (To be updated and added soon).
